name: Planet Vulgare
description:
Did you know that there are different versions of Earth? Jhorm and his Homade tribe discovered it at their expense. The inhabitants of a plant-dominated Earth stole the elemental totems that the Homades protected in order to strengthen the elements of their planet Earth at the expense of yours. The portal they crossed to come and steal from you is still open, go after them, kill the generals who hold the 4 totems in order to restore the balance of the elements in your Earth.

 The use of : Unity, Blender, Mixamo
